# Portfolio

Recraft is active within the DevOps area of software consultancy - and might be a good partner if you are looking for specialist competency in technologies like Docker for the purpose of modernizing traditional apps to make them run in the cloud.

However, Recraft has a primary focus on providing services within R software development (and/or training). Examples of earlier work with public availability at GitHub and using Free and Open Source software licenses: 

- https://github.com/raquamaps
- https://github.com/rekonstrukt
- https://github.com/recraft-ou
